title: Johnny Depp Vs Amber Heard… the fool breakdown
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Manny and Laura cover the famous Johnny Depp and Amber "Turd" civil case that is blowing up all over social media! They dive deep into the timeline of their relationship, the crazy stories that have come from the case, a psychologist testimony, and much more!
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733
More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.
Thanks to our sponsors: 

Start your 100-day trial and shop the entire Away lineup of travel essentials, including their best-selling suitcases at awaytravel.com/fool.

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Fool Coverage with Manny MUA and Laura Lee listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/foolcoverage. 


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
